section.title: Using USB Devices on a Red Hat Enterprise Linux Client
section.para: The usbredir package enables USB redirection from Red Hat Enterprise Linux clients to virtual machines. usbredir is a dependency of the virt-viewer package, and is automatically installed together with that package.

procedure.title: Using USB devices on a Red Hat Enterprise Linux client

step.para: Click the Virtual Machines tab and select a virtual machine that has been configured to use the SPICE protocol.
Ensure USB support is set to Native:
Select Native from the USB Support drop-down list.
Click the Console Options button and select the Enable USB Auto-Share check box.

Start the virtual machine and click the Console button to connect to that virtual machine. When you plug your USB device into the client machine, it will automatically be redirected to appear on your guest machine.
